compendium-themer.settings.removeBanners: All compendium banner images will be removed.
Height of compendium items. Use 55px for compact view. Foundry default is: 70px. This setting is ignored if 'Apply Minimal CSS' is enabled.
compendium-themer.settings.hideSource.hi: Compendium source in the bottom left corner will be hidden.
compendium-themer.settings.labelAlignmen: The side to which compendium label will be aligned. This setting is ignored if 'Apply Minimal CSS' is enabled.
compendium-themer.settings.reset.name: Reset settings to default
compendium-themer.settings.reset.label: Reset Settings To Default
compendium-themer.settings.reset.hint: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default.
compendium-themer.settings.applyMinimalC: Apply some style to the compendium directory for make the elements more small but still readable.
compendium-themer.settings.debug.name: Enable debugging
compendium-themer.settings.debug.label: Prints debug messages to the console
Are you sure you want to reset all of the module settings to the current system's defaults? THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE!
